blog.application.name=博客 ### Missing: blog.archive.paneltitle = Blog Archive ### Missing: blog.archive.pagetitle = Archive blog.archive.noarticle = 当前没有文章...... ### Missing: blog.archive.postsyear = posts for {0} blog.archive.unpublished = （未发布） blog.archive.hidden = （隐藏） blog.archive.noarticlesyear = 本年没有文章...... ### Missing: blog.archive.postsfor = posts for blog.archive.noarticlesmonth = 本月没有文章...... blog.code.blogsheet = 博客样式 blog.code.sheetexplanation = 该样式将用于显示博客文档。 blog.code.notblog = 不是博客文档 blog.code.published = 该博客评论当前没有发布。 blog.code.hidden = 博客评论已隐藏 blog.code.notpublished = 该博客评论当前没有发布。发布它。 ### Missing: blog.code.madevisible = Made entry visible blog.code.hid = 隐藏此文 blog.code.makevisible = 此博文对其他用户不可见。使它可见。 blog.code.hide = 对其他用户隐藏该博客评论 ### Missing: blog.code.loading = Loading... ### Missing: blog.code.failedToChangeBlogPostVisibility = Failed to change blog post visibility. blog.code.editpost = 编辑该博客评论 blog.code.deletepost = 删除该博客评论 blog.code.readpost = 阅读全文 blog.code.postedby = 由谁评论 blog.code.createdby = 由谁创建 blog.code.modifiedby = 由谁修改 blog.code.comments = 评论 ### Missing: blog.code.permalink = Permalink blog.code.categories = 类别： blog.code.in = 在 the {0} space ### Missing: blog.code.description.wiki = Most recent blog posts in the wiki ### Missing: blog.code.title = Blog ### Missing: blog.code.warning = Warning: blog.sheet.notpost = 不是一个博客评论！ 该文章当前尚未发表。 blog.sheet.publish = 发布 blog.sheet.setdate = 设置发布日期： ### Missing: blog.sheet.image=Image ### Missing: blog.sheet.image.info=The image field is used to attach a thumbnail to each blog post. The post thumbnails will be visible only in cases where the blog is configured to use the 'image' layout. ### Missing: blog.sheet.choose_image=Choose an image blog.category.created = {0}类已创建。 blog.category.exists = {0}类已存在。 ### Missing: blog.categories.paneltitle = Blog Categories blog.categories.name = 名字： blog.categories.parentcategory = 父类： blog.categories.description = 描述：
